attributes.description: The City of Dania Beach uses our solar street lighting systems to improve security in neighborhoods and lower their reliance on local utility power. The project consists of over 300 solar street light systems designed to withstand 150 mph winds. This award winning project represents the largest solar lighting installation in Florida.
attributes.title: Dania Beach

attributes.description: SEPCO—Solar Electric Power Company is a worldwide leader in outdoor solar lighting for over 20 years.  SEPCO founder, Steve Robbins, invented the first commercial solar street light over 25 years ago.   As demonstrated through thousands of projects around the world, SEPCO solar light systems feature rugged commercial-grade construction combined with unparalleled quality, performance, reliability, 25+ year system life expectancy and the best warranty in the business. Please visit our website at www.sepco-solarlighting.com for more details on how SEPCO can help you illuminate streets, roadways, parking lots, pathways, parks, signs, bus shelters, etc. with the power clean, renewable solar energy.
attributes.address: 1521 Southeast Palm Court, Stuart, FL 34994, USA
attributes.title: SEPCO - Solar Electric Power Company
SEPCO - Solar Electric Power Company to Dania Beach

attributes.description: The City of Bradenton Beach uses turtle friendly decorative solar LED lights to light the city's main beachfront thoroughfares to avoid the cost of installing conventional lighting. Cities have found the same high quality fixtures that they prefer in a solar version; available from SEPCO for their urban streetscape projects.
attributes.title: SEPCO - Solar Electric Power Company to Bradenton Beach

attributes.description: The Pacific Missile Range Facility uses our solar shoebox lighting systems to light the roads around the facility for increased security and visibility at night.
attributes.title: SEPCO - Solar Electric Power Company to Pacific Missile Range Facility
SEPCO - Solar Electric Power Company to Command Forces Afghanistan
attributes.description: The US Army uses our solar electric street lighting systems in Iraq and Afghanistan to help rebuild infrastructure and protect people from insurgents.

The US Army Corps of Engineers chose our solar street lights for more than 22 miles of roadway in Fallujah, Iraq and in surrounding communities. These communities are now fully illuminated with 1,200 single and double solar powered street lights.
attributes.title: SEPCO - Solar Electric Power Company to US Army Fallujah Iraq
SEPCO - Solar Electric Power Company to Hawaii Preparatory Academy
attributes.description: The Hawaii Preparatory Academy uses our solar street lighting systems around the surrounding roads leading to and from the academy.
